summary: A beautiful Solitude style home outside of Whiterun. Features a walled in backyard with a gate, garden, pond, stables. The home features luxurious furnishings and decor with the added bonus of a smelter, forge, etc, enchanting and alchemy station. Even your own vendor and a bonsai garden!
descriptionHtml:
Update: V 2. Added a gate for the backyard, stables, and garden. It could use a bit of a trim, but I\'m not sure how to do that. For now it just looks like a lush wonderland of green. :) I like it.
Inside: Added some treats to the crafting room, fixed all the mannequins (hopefully). For some reason the one in the bedroom is making a weird pose. Added a large master bedroom, and a follower room. Added a little bonsai garden in the main room. Also added the third door. 
Let me know how you like it. :D
-----------------------------------------------

This is my first mod. I based this home off of the Thalmor Embassy. It is conveniently located SW of Whiterun stables. It comes with a smelter, forge, enchanting, alchemy area, etc. Even your own personal vendor! :D I made him a Khajiit and named him after my cat. <3 But, I think it\'s a beautiful home. I certainly put a lot of hours into it. It\'s still a little bare, so any suggestions for improvements would be nice. I have a few clipping issues, but I don\'t think it\'s too bad.

Enjoy. :)
author: Wintercrypt
